pageContext.course_type_long_description: Master the magic of Harry Potter using LEGOÂ®! Build Diagon Alley in preparation for your trip to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. pageContext.action_url_comment: Camp takes place in Akron School and is $90 for the 3 days Monday-Wed.
